name: Harmonic Spell
text: You can weave bardic music effects into your spellcasting in such a way that your spellcasting and bardic performance become indistinguishable.
benefit: Whenever you cast a spell while you are maintaining a bardic performance, you can maintain the bardic performance for that round without expending one of your rounds of performance for the day. In addition, you can switch from one bardic performance to another as a swift action when you cast a spell while maintaining a bardic performance.
text_zh: 你能够将施法与吟游表演之间的界限变得模糊，以此方式使吟游音乐的效果与施法编织在一起。
prerequisites_zh: 吟游表演职业能力（原文为Bardic music，疑似原文手滑）。
benefit_zh: 若你在维持吟游表演时施放法术，则能够在该轮维持吟游表演的同时忽略该轮的每日吟游表演轮数的消耗。此外，当你在施放法术的同时维持吟游表演的话，就能够以迅捷动作将一种吟游表演切换至另外一种。
